data.title: Weather in Langenthal, canton of Bern, Switzerland
data.meta_description: The most accurate current weather forecast in Langenthal. Be prepared for today's weather with a detailed local report.
data.text:
Weather details for Langenthal, on Friday, August 16th:

The maximum temperature during the day will be 28°C around 3 pm. The day will have very high relative humidity, with average humidity of 78%, ranging from 53% to a maximum value of 96% at about 7 am. The wind will be light, and will get up to 9 km/h at 8 pm, blowing from the south. The cloud coverage will range from 3% around 9 am to as high as 85% around 6 pm with an average of 27%.

The chances of precipitation throughout the day will change between 0% and 15%. The highest chance for precipitation will be around 5 pm and the lowest probability around midnight. The dew point will range from 16°C up to a maximum value of 19°C around 8 pm.

The visibility is expected to be good with average visibility of 13 km throughout the day. Atmospheric pressure will be normal with average pressure of 1018 hPa. Sunrise will be at 6:31 am, and sunset at 8:35 pm. The day will have 14 hours and 4 minutes of daylight.

Air quality forecast for Langenthal, on Friday, August 16th:

On average, the air quality on this day will be good, meaning that air quality is satisfactory, and air pollution poses little or no risk. According to our index, ranging from 0 to 500, the air quality is going to be between values of 30 and 45.

Pollen forecast for Langenthal, on Friday, August 16th:

The overall pollen forecast for this day shows no significant pollen. Tree pollen on this day is expected to have no risk. There's no risk of weed pollen, and as for grass pollen, this day is expected to have very low risk.

Weather information for Langenthal, on Saturday, August 17th:

The maximum temperature during the day will be 27°C at about 5 pm. The day will have very high relative humidity, with average humidity of 82%, ranging from 54% to a maximum value of 96% at about 2 am. The wind will be light, and will get up to 12 km/h at 11 pm, blowing from the south-west. The cloud coverage will range from 8% around 2 pm to as high as 100% around 11 pm with an average of 62%.

The chances of precipitation throughout the day will change between 0% and 40%. The highest chance for precipitation will be around 11 pm and the lowest probability around midnight. The dew point will range from 16°C up to a maximum value of 18°C around 8 pm.

The visibility is expected to be good with average visibility of 13 km throughout the day. Atmospheric pressure will be normal with average pressure of 1015 hPa. Sunrise will be at 6:32 am, and sunset at 8:33 pm, making it a total of 14 hours and 1 minutes of daylight.

Air quality forecast for Langenthal, on Saturday, August 17th:

On average, the air quality on this day will be good, meaning that air quality is satisfactory, and air pollution poses little or no risk. According to our index, ranging from 0 to 500, the air quality is going to be between values of 27 and 41.

Pollen forecast for Langenthal, on Saturday, August 17th:

The overall pollen forecast for this day shows no significant pollen. Tree pollen on this day is expected to have no risk. There's no risk of weed pollen, and as for grass pollen, this day is expected to have no risk.
